statement.p: A subscription plan for a GPS tracking device costs 14.99 per month plus 0.10 per location ping (sent once every 10 minutes). What is the monthly charge if the device was used for 4 hours and 28 minutes?

solution.p: First, we need to know how many pings are sent in 4 hours and 28 minutes. This is a total of \displaystyle{4}\cdot{60}+{28}={268} minutes. This is \displaystyle\frac{{268}}{{10}}={26.8} 10 minute periods. Any time past the last 10 minute segment does not generate another ping so only 26 pings will be sent.
